title: What are the best Hermione-Draco fanfiction ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: that’s so hard to answer but i have a list of my absolute must reads before you die: Broken by inadaze22 ~ haunting and beautiful with incredible characterizations. you won’t find much better writing than this masterpiece.What the Room Requires by Alydia Rackham ~ a lovely plot with a fair bit of angst. Alydia writes wonderfully and creates a picture of the entire story with just her words.Aurelian by BittyBlueEyes ~ a stunning story that tells a tale of war, love, and time. definitely give this a go, it’s lovely.Crimson with a Silver Lining by Lady Cailan ~ you can’t ship dramione without reading this story. it’s heavy in its plot (war fic) and chapters but beautifully written.The Fallout by everythursday ~ i cannot stress the flawless writing that is everythursday . if you ship dramione this is for you. the way she captures each character is magical and her plot is two times as wonderful. it’s is long and war heavy, but worth every minute and every tear.Out of the Silent Planet by everythursday ~ i mean, she is the best when it comes to dramione. another masterpiece by the one and only everythursday. very different from what i usually read, but i was obsessed after the first few chapters. if you like dark draco, this beauty is for you.The Fool, the Emperor, and the Hanged Man by ianthe_waiting ~ (dark Harry) this fic is wonderfully written and will definitely keep the reader involved with its mysterious and dark plotBespoke Affinity by Glitterally ~ this is a bit different as it is LuciusxHermiomexDraco but if you’re into that the dramione is absolutely lovely. i enjoyed every minute of this read, couldn’t put it down really. very well written and each relationship blossoms beautifully.Relationship Status: Pending by Craft Rose ~ wow. i just finished this read and i quite literally couldn’t put it down. i’ve never read a first person pov written so incredibly relatable. i’d also never believed in Theomione until reading this. don’t worry, there is still plenty of angsty dramione, but both relationship are written so stunningly beautiful and i shed tears. Hermione is witty and Theo is kind and Draco is so beautifully flawed. this masterpiece will touch your heartThe Politicians Wife by Pir8fancier ~ another incredible first person narrative. this fic is witty and Draco is so wonderfully passionateeverytime i call one of these fics a masterpiece, i mean it. every fanfic i read and have put on this list is near perfect in my opinion. i am never interested in a story unless the writing is excellent, the plot is spectacular, and the characterizations are beautiful. this list embodies each of these must-reads. give them a go!!

Since fanfiction is my literal drug of choice, here’s some Dramione fics you should savor. These fics are not for the light of heart nor are they written horribly. The writers are magnificent. Matter of fact…anyone interested in checking out this sordid, hysterical, wtf was I drinking last night couple should hit these stories up. Most of these are ranging from T to M, cause seriously…anything less is an insult.  Mine By: Curiositykils (Veela Fic set Ten Years after the War. Draco is a Veela. Hermione isn't his Healer. She's just his.) There have been a few fics to top this, but yeaaah…if there was a GOLD STANDARD, than this is it. I just read the title and already started turning red. hahahaha19 years later By: Cuteblndegoddess (Post DH. Canon with all seven books. Hermione and Draco have to work together on what should be a simple project. But something that happened 19 years earlier changes both of them. Dramione eventually.) Snarky, wholesome, freaking goodness!Isolation by Bex-chan (He can't leave the room. Her room. And it's all the Order's fault. Confined to a small space with only the Mudblood for company, something's going to give. Maybe his sanity. Maybe not. "There," she spat. "Now your Blood's filthy too!" DM/HG. PostHBP. Now complete with epilogue.) Read this supernova and leave a love letter to the fanfic authorThe Slow Thaw By: camnz (Hermione is serving at Malfoy Mansion after the war was lost. In her bleak existance, she manages to find ways to cope. Contains nonconsentual. COMPLETE.) They lost the war…Draconian Heart By: camnz (Hermione had known the bitter end was coming, but it still took her by surprise as their cottage was crumbling from the force of the Deatheaters' assault. There really wasn't any hope left, but she would fight none the less. The dark side had won and there was no place left in the world for the remnants of her side, so this is how it ends. Very DARK - contains non consentual.) Bad end, but damn good story. Probably keep tissues near by though… there’s one helluva twist.Consequences by camnz (Hermione is acting funny, watching Malfoy during class and during dinner, and Ginny is urging Harry to do something. Surely Hermione couldn't be under the influence of a spell or a potion; she wasn't acting completely stupid, but then maybe she was too smart to show something like that.)DramaA Private War by camnz (Hogwarts decides to hold an academic tournament to rally the students after the end of the war, providing Hermione and Draco a chance to air some unfinished business.) A dazzling fic!!! <3 (Posted note: Haters can hate Dramione, but you can’t deny the golden fanfics that spring forth for this pair! I always believed Draco had a deep seated lust/hate for Hermione. She was perfect in every way except for being a Gryfindor and a “filthy” mudblood. Hermione stood up to him, was the brightest witch of her age, stood by Harry Potter, and destroyed every believed prejudice ever had by “purebloods”. She’s like a metaphorical kick to his nutz. Of course, Draco is gonna go apeshit and be the biggest asshole in the world to this chic. He wanted her to die, because she was untouchable. lmao) And he couldn’t mess w/ her…

Here are some of my favorite Dramione Fanfictions of all times. These range from rating T to M Isolation by Bex-Chan, rated M- He can't leave the room. Her room. And it's all the Order's fault. Confined to a small space with only the Mudblood for company, something's going to give. Maybe his sanity. Maybe not. "There," she spat. "Now your Blood's filthy too!". Operation Cheer up Granger But Don’t Die Trying by MyPhoenixLament, rated T- It made the world seem a little unbalanced; Granger was supposed to be Grangerish, and that was simply a fact of life. In which Hermione behaves oddly, Draco goes to ridiculous lengths, and Harry has no idea what's going on. The Ten Labors of Draco and Hermione by evilrabidplotbunnies, rated T- THIS STORY IS DANGEROUS. IT HAS CAUSED NUMEROUS PEOPLE TO BE KICKED OUT OF LIBRARIES, RECEIVE STRANGE LOOKS FROM FAMILY MEMBERS, AND GO CLINICALLY INSANE. DO NOT, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, READ THIS STORY. ESPECIALLY NOT CHAPTER 19. Suppressed Emotions by hopelesslydevoted.xx, Rated T- "Granger what the hell?" Draco asked looking at her ruffled clothes, and her face covered in blood. Hermione let out a loud sob and threw herself into his arms. - Draco and Hermione are forced to live together after Hermione gets attacked during patrolling. Relying on her worst enemy to keep her safe, what could go wrong, right? Children of The Dark by cleotheo, Rated T: It's time for Harry, Hermione and Draco to start school. But what happens when two of the golden trio aren't who they appear to be and are best friends with a Slytherin? Dark Hermione! Dark Harry! First in a seven part series. Queen of Swords by ravenslight, Rated M: Hermione Granger is the weapon they never intended to create. And she will bow down to no one. / Voldemort wins AU. Slowburn Dramione. More to be added soon

There was this one in the past that I always liked, and true that there are many clichés stories everywhere. My recommendations are: The Hoax (Dramione Story)This is one of the cliché plots that Hermione wants revenge on poor Ron, but the pace is somewhat slow, the romance I mean, and a great read. Simply IrresistibleAn AfterWar! story where all the characters are adults that have jobs. An interesting take on Dramione. I also recommend you read the sequel, it has a peek of the background in Hogwarts. Dramione: WANTEDThis one is gold. That is all I have to say. https://www.fanfiction.net/s/6532581/1/What-the-Room-Requires Beautifully written and would have you holding your heart. https://www.fanfiction.net/s/12671848/1/A-Shell-Some-Earbuds-and-Too-Many-Memories-A-Dramione-Fanfic An o-k story, but I don’t know if you’d like this one. https://www.fanfiction.net/s/12852102/1/The-Art-of-Divination Set in the period of Hocrux Hunting. It would be nice if you would also read the sequel to this. There are many more in communities on FF.net and you can search it on Wattpad or DeviantArt. I just saw this today, sorry for the late answer.

These are in no particular order of favourites because I love them all. I was first very sceptical of Dramione fanfics but now, every time I open up my web browser, I have three of them open at the same time! The first Dramione fanfic I read was ‘What the Room Requires’. It is amazing and I am reading it again! I have read A LOT of Dramione fanfics and I think that these are the best: What the Room Requires - What the Room Requires Chapter 1, a harry potter fanfic Matched - Matched Chapter 1: Ministry Life, a harry potter fanfic Fate Has Its Ways - Fate Has Its Ways Chapter 1, a harry potter fanfic Graveyard Valentine - Graveyard Valentine, a harry potter fanfic Eight and Eighth - Eight and Eighth Chapter 1: First Summer After the Fall, a harry potter fanfic A Lot of History - A Lot of History Chapter 1, a harry potter fanfic Exceeding Expectations - Exceeding Expectations Chapter 1: I, a harry potter fanfic

I think Simply Irresistible is the best Dramione fic I’ve ever read. It takes place a few years after the war and Ron cheated on Hermione with a model named Sadie because he had wanted something new, something different and Hermione was too invested in her work and never really made an effort, or at least not the kind of effort Ron wanted and needed. Sadie cheated on Draco with Ron, simply because she could and Draco contacted Hermione, originally it was so he could get revenge by making Hermione really beautiful to show Ron what he’d been missing and it’s revealed that the two slowly became friends when they retook their seventh year at Hogwarts with Ron and Harry. The two eventually have feelings for each other. I don’t usually like Dramione fan fiction but this one is so beautifully written and makes so much sense that I love it. https://my.w.tt/B1vUpUSB47

This is so old but: Manacled by SenLinYu The fallout by Everythursday The right thing to do by Lovesbitca8 Isolation by Bex-chan Hunted by Bex-Chan Love and other misfortunes by SenLinYu Broken by inadaze22 The politician's wife by pir8fancier Once more with feeling by Kyonomiko Wait and Hope by an mightbewriting The eagle's nest by HeartofAspen The fool, the emperor and the hanged man by Ianthe waiting Love in a time of the zombie apocalypse by Rizzle

‘in which the characters are very similar to the way JKR wrote them' If they are in their canon characters there won't be any ‘dramione' at all. As canon Hermione wouldn't look back at her abuser. If she feels anything other than pure hatred for malfoy it will automatically become ooc. Same with canon malfoy. He would never fall for a muggleborn. It's only possible if you rewrite their characters.

The Founders Heirs Chapter 1: Lend Me Your Hand, a harry potter fanfic This one, without a doubt. It’s credible (as opposed to a LOT of Dramione’s that I see.) and very well written. If you want to see Dramione done right, dealing with all the impediments to this pairing, than I can think of no finer example. (Of course, there are no shortage of fairy tale Draco and Hermione. They aren’t the characters we know though.)

The Green Girl & Rebuilding by Colubrina Punch drunk (funny) Provocative Envy Isolation by Bex -Chan Pretty much anything written by RZZMG but a good story is Eros &Psyche (Explicit) RZZMG Give unto me by Kittensfift17 I, along with thousands of others have enjoyed these stories, and I hope you do too. These stories can be found on http://fanfiction.net

Fanfiction.net: Isolation Cruel and Beautiful World. A Case of Kidnnapping Creature. Risk Reward Ratio. Magnetic Attraction. The Boy in the Hammock. Of Kings and Queens. Wattpad: Draconian by hepburnnetes (idk if I spelled the username right)

i know this is an old ask but…  this here is one of the best fanfics i’ve ever read and i feel like this story is underrated as well. on the other hand,  this slow-burn fic is also one of my best-reads so far and is also a tearjerker🥺 lastly,  this one is also good but not as great as the two aforementioned. :)))

Isolation and Hunted by Bex-Chan What the Room Requires Broken Hermione Malfoy Becoming a Beta Blood Traitor by Zalia Heed his Sweet call Its all Uncharted Make me forget his name I can't hate you anymore His and Her Scars
Thanks for the A2A I have 2 favorites: Isolation by bex-chan on fanfiction.net Draconian by Hepburnettes on Wattpad Those two are masterpiece.
Ive read many of them and I like them all except the veela ones

Well the answer is that they would never get together if their personalities were similar to the ones in the books. Draco multiple times wished that she would die so no there is no possible way in a canon Harry Potter universe they would ever get together. Every story that has them get together has to be very OOC. Nobody wants to be with somebody who is racist towards your kind and actively want you dead.
